text:
For all those spreading nonsense about carrying a #vaccine passport for travel. This has been going for years-here’s my certs for Small Pox, Cholera, Yellow Fever & Typhoid

It’s quite normal if you’ve ever visited anywhere away from Benidorm or Magaluf🙃
